description:
For more than 60 years, the SUGARMAN law office in Boston, Massachusetts, has provided unmatched legal representation to personal injury victims and their families across our great Commonwealth.

Today, our law firm's attorneys carry on our ingrained tradition of delivering compassionate, personalized counsel and aggressive advocacy for those who suffered an injury or lost a loved one as the result of someone else's negligence or wrongdoing. Over the course of our firm's history, we have represented thousands of families in need, and we have become one of the leading personal injury practices in Massachusetts and beyond by setting legal precedents and obtaining record-breaking verdicts and settlements for our clients. This success is the direct result of our decades of legal experience and extensive legal knowledge.

Whether your claim involves a construction site accident, fire/explosion, a defective product, an act of medical malpractice or any other type of preventable tragedy, you can trust SUGARMAN to analyze your potential claim, offer the solid advice you need and fight hard for you and your loved ones. To find out more, you can contact SUGARMAN by calling our office or visiting our law firm's website to receive a free initial consultation. Unlike most firms who use intake coordinators and administrators, we pride ourselves on having a personal injury attorney speak to each and every potential client at the outset.
